item.title: APLS
item.description: score:964 Chances: Apellis Pharmaceuticals grants equity awards to new employees as part of the company’s employment inducement plan. Apellis reports better-than-expected second-quarter 2023 results, with significant growth in net product revenues. SYFOVRE shows promise in reducing GA lesion growth and demonstrates consistent safety profile in clinical studies.
